John,

Haynes lists two Ishiguro Masamori that signed with these kanji, H
0=
4225.0 and H 04227.0 - the first said to be a student of the first
Ishiguro=
 Masatsune (H 04751.0)  but an independent artist, but the
name was also us=
ed by the second Ishiguro Masatsune H 04752.0. The
second Masamori listing =
appears to be for a student of the second
Ishiguro Mastasune who died ca. 1=
800.

The photos are a bit blurry - or maybe it's my eyes - and I'm no
auth=
ority on the signature. There should be examples in Wakayama that
someone c=
an look up, my copies are in the warehouse.
